name: speedcode-extension
description: LeetCode problem tracker with social features

scripts.build: npm run clean:chrome && vite build && npm run post-build:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean:firefox && vite build --outDir dist-firefox && npm run post-build:firefox
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:firefox
scripts.post-build:chrome: npm run copy-assets:chrome && npm run copy-manifest:chrome && npm run copy-scripts:chrome && npm run fix-html:chrome
scripts.post-build:firefox: npm run copy-assets:firefox && npm run copy-manifest:firefox && npm run copy-scripts:firefox && npm run fix-html:firefox
scripts.copy-scripts:chrome: cp public/content.js dist/content.js && cp public/background.js dist/background.js
scripts.copy-scripts:firefox: cp public/content.js dist-firefox/content.js && cp public/background.firefox.js dist-firefox/background.js
scripts.fix-html:chrome: if [ -f dist/src/popup.html ]; then mv dist/src/popup.html dist/popup.html && rm -rf dist/src; fi
scripts.fix-html:firefox: if [ -f dist-firefox/src/popup.html ]; then mv dist-firefox/src/popup.html dist-firefox/popup.html && rm -rf dist-firefox/src; fi

author: dev & co-dev
